Package net.jodah.lyra.event

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChannelListener
    Listens for Channel related events.
    ConnectionListener
    Listens for Connection related events.
    ConsumerListener
    Listens for Consumer related events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultChannelListener
    No-op channel listener for sub-classing.
    DefaultConnectionListener
    No-op connection listener for sub-classing.
    DefaultConsumerListener
    No-op consumer listener for sub-classing.
